metadata.title: CVE-2018-16083 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An out of bounds read in forward error correction code in WebRTC in GoogleChrome prior to 69.0.3497.81 allowed a remote attacker to perform an out ofbounds memory read via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
